name: Episode 1: Best Way to Cross the USA...United?
description:
In the "Transcon Throwdown" miniseries, I'll check out the best service from four major US airlines on their routes between the Northeast and the West Coast. After I've checked out all four products, I'll post a wrap-up video comparing and rating each airline on:

1. Seat
2. Food
3. Service
4. Entertainment

Be sure to subscribe so you don't miss it!

In this episode, we'll check out United Airlines Premium Transcontinental Service from Newark to San Francisco. Watch the video to check out United Airlines' finest service in the United States.

The thirty year-old 757 may have a lot of hours, but let's see how comfortable the seat is and how United helps its business class passengers pass the time on a six-hour flight cross-country.

Stay tuned for more episodes of the Transcon Throwdown!

For more trip reports, please subscribe to my channel!
https://www.youtube.com/jebbrooksflies

Check me out on Instagram:
https://www.instagram.com/jebbrooks/

And don't forget to take a look at my travel blog:
https://greenergrass.com/

Music:
First Law of Motion by Johannes Bornlof
Transcendence by Johannes Bornlof
